snippet: Usually adversaries, Ivan Nova and David Ortiz recently celebrated something in common: a championship won by their former team, the Leones del Escogido.
abstract: New York Yankees pitcher Ivan Nova and Boston Red Sox first baseman David Ortiz, usually adversaries who part of one of fiercest rivalries in sports, each played for the Leones del Escogido, which won the Dominican winter league championship in January 2011.
lead_paragraph: Usually adversaries, Ivan Nova and David Ortiz recently celebrated something in common: a championship won by their former team, the Leones del Escogido.

headline.seo: Yankees’ Nova and Red Sox’ Ortiz on Same Team for Once
headline.main: Bitter Rivalry Thaws, if Briefly, on a Street in the Dominican Republic
headline.print_headline: Bitter Rivalry Thaws, if Briefly, on a Street in the Dominican Republic
